npc_output: I'm getting ready for work, it's midnight and this stormy weather is not helping |r1|
Not great, it's hot and I'm feeling sad and anxious, I wish I could go hunting
Actually, yes, I need to taste the fresh oven after market, want to help me
Just bored, it's foggy and evening, not much to do
Not much, just getting ready for the parade, want to amuse the witty prank during parade with me
